key.name: shutdown-max-timer-value
key.description: Set maximum selectable shutdown time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.

key.name: wake-max-timer-value
key.description: Set maximum selectable wake time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.

key.name: shutdown-ref-timer-value
key.description: Reference start time for shutdown either now or HH:MM

key.name: show-shutdown-absolute-timer-value
key.summary: Display shutdown time as absolute timestamp
key.description: Display shutdown time as absolute timestamp "HH:MM"

key.name: wake-ref-timer-value
key.description: Reference start time for wake either now, shutdown, or HH:MM

key.name: show-wake-absolute-timer-value
key.summary: Display wake time as absolute timestamp
key.description: Display wake time as absolute timestamp "HH:MM"

key.name: auto-wake-value
key.summary: Automatically start and stop wake on shutdown timer toggle
key.description: Enable/Disable the wake alarm when the shutdown timer is started/stopped.

key.name: shutdown-timestamp-value
key.description: Unix time in seconds of scheduled shutdown or -1 if disabled.

key.name: wake-slider-value
key.description: Set wake slider position as percent of the maximum time. Must be in range 0 and 100.

key.name: nonlinear-wake-slider-value
key.summary: Ramp-up of non-linear wake slider value
key.description: Exponential ramp-up for wake time slider

key.name: shutdown-slider-value
key.description: Set shutdown slider position as percent of the maximum time. Must be in range 0 and 100.

key.name: nonlinear-shutdown-slider-value
key.summary: Ramp-up of non-linear shutdown slider value
key.description: Exponential ramp-up for shutdown time slider

key.name: show-settings-value
key.description: Show/hide settings button in widget.

key.name: show-shutdown-slider-value
key.description: Show/hide shutdown slider in widget.

key.name: show-wake-slider-value
key.description: Show/hide wake slider in widget.

key.name: show-wake-items-value
key.description: Show/hide all wake items in widget.

key.name: show-textboxes-value
key.description: Show/hide notification text boxes on screen.

key.name: root-mode-value
key.description: Set root mode on/off. In root mode powering off is done via 'pkexec' and 'shutdown' terminal command.

key.name: show-end-session-dialog-value
key.description: Show the end-session dialog for reboot and shutdown if screensaver is inactive.

key.name: show-shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Comma-separated shutdown modes which are shown in the popup menu (p: poweroff, s: suspend, r: reboot)

key.name: shutdown-mode-value
key.description: Mode to use for timer action

key.name: show-shutdown-indicator-value
key.description: Shows the remaining time until shutdown action

key.name: check-command-value
key.default:
"# Examples ...
# Run a pre-shutdown script (e.g. updates or backups) # ~/.local/scripts/pre-shutdown.sh
# Wait for a process to exit # tail -f --pid=$PID
# Activate the screen saver # gdbus call --session \\ # --dest org.gnome.ScreenSaver \\ # --object-path /org/gnome/ScreenSaver \\ # --method org.gnome.ScreenSaver.SetActive true >/dev/null"
key.description: Run command(s) before shutdown command. Proceed with shutdown only if check command succeeds.

key.name: enable-check-command-value
key.description: Check command is skipped if disabled.

key.name: preferences-selected-page-value
key.summary: Last selected page in the preferences.
key.description: Last selected page in the preferences.
